system.description:
Your connection to the elements deepens and each elements effect is improved.

  • Fire: The Aura increases to 6m and in addition to setting a target on fire after a successful MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK they trigger a firey explosion in a 3m radius around the target that hits every creature except you with the area. If the attack is higher than the creatures DODGE they take fire damage equal to 2d6 + Rage.

  • Earth: The Aura increases to 6m and poisonous mist is additionally swirling around you decreasing the TOUGHNESS of enemies within the area by half your Rage.

  • Water: The Aura increases to 6m and a small snowstorm or maelstrom swirls around you decreasing the DODGE of enemies within the area by half your Rage.

  • Air: The Aura increases to 6m and now 3 lightning strikes appear after each MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK but they canâ€™t strike the same target twice.
